abstract: There are good reasons to believe that the real estate slump has a long way to go, and that’s the main reason the Fed went further than most analysts expected in cutting interest rates.
snippet: There are good reasons to believe that the real estate slump has a long way to go, and that’s the main reason the Fed went further than most analysts expected in cutting interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve sent the stock market soaring yesterday. So can it stop the decline in home prices, too?

headline.main: Will the Fed Reverse the Housing Slump?
headline.print_headline: A Slump That’s Far From Over
